name: Harvest Blues
description:
it's finally autumn, and koharu has some mixed feelings about that. enjoy a short reflection on the coming season, pick out a cute sweater, make some cider, and chat with your partner!

the characters:

game features:

- short (~3min) gameplay
- static visual novel with 1 ending
- 3 sweater options
- reflect on the changing seasons by yourself and in dialogue w/ your partner

other info:

this is my first ever game, and made under a time crunch for the cozy fall 2022 jam, so it's a bit rough around the edges. that said, thank you for taking the time to look at this game page, even if you don't decide to try the game out yourself. and if you do, please tell me, i'd love to know if you enjoyed it!!

if you like these characters, or even just the art, follow me on your sm platform of choice so you can keep up with whatever i'm working on next!
